articles.title: 5 Reasons Why Ben Stokes Is So Special | Highlights Of England Men's New Test Captain - England & Wales Cricket Board
articles.description: On the day that Ben Stokes is announced as England men's new Test captain, watch highlights of five of his most magical moments to date. Find out more at ecb...
